# Allow AI models to index for search 

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /  # Allow listing in AI-powered search
Allow: /blog/* 

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /  # Allow indexing for AI-powered search
Allow: /blog/*

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /  # Allow Perplexity AI search to list your site
Allow: /blog/*

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /

Allow: /
